input:
Galatasaray 1 - 4 Arsenal

First Half:

00:00 Event: Kick-off by Arsenal
00:40 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
00:55 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
01:22 Event: Ball out of play
01:29 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
02:00 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
02:01 Event: Goal by Arsenal
02:01 Event: Goal by Arsenal
02:41 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
03:14 Event: Foul by Arsenal
03:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
04:54 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
05:07 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
05:27 Event: Ball out of play
05:34 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
06:06 Event: Ball out of play
06:30 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
06:37 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
06:38 Event: Ball out of play
06:55 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
07:13 Event: Ball out of play
07:22 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
07:32 Event: Ball out of play
07:39 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
07:53 Event: Ball out of play
07:59 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
08:19 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
09:10 Event: Ball out of play
09:22 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
10:15 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
10:16 Event: Goal by Arsenal
10:37 Caption: Goal - 0:2! Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) receives a precise pass inside the box from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and he beats the goalkeeper with a neat finish into the bottom right corner.
10:57 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
11:09 Event: Ball out of play
11:13 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
11:34 Caption: Mathieu Debuchy (Arsenal) delivers a lovely cross into the penalty area. Nevertheless, an opposition defender is alert and averts the danger with a brilliant clearance.
11:52 Caption: The Galatasaray players are exchanging some short passes and control the game at the moment, but one of the defending players steps in and intercepts the ball.
13:06 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
13:27 Event: Ball out of play
13:50 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
14:28 Event: Foul by Arsenal
14:37 Event: Yellow card by Arsenal
14:55 Caption: Mathieu Flamini (Arsenal) receives a yellow card for a nasty tackle.
15:05 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
15:24 Caption: Galatasaray continue the game with a quickly taken free kick.
16:14 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
16:15 Event: Ball out of play
16:21 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) makes a yard for himself and goes for goal from long range. It never troubles the goalkeeper as it flies into the stands. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
16:35 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
16:58 Caption: Some great controlled play and passing from Arsenal. They are increasing their possession of the ball and trying to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.
17:03 Event: Offside by Arsenal
17:13 Caption: Mathieu Debuchy latches onto a perfect defence-splitting pass from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Arsenal) and heads towards goal. Mathieu Debuchy (Arsenal) finds himself behind the opposition's defence, but the game is stopped for offside.
17:16 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
17:51 Event: Ball out of play
17:56 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
17:57 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) produces a dangerous lofted cross into the box which is intercepted. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray have been awarded a corner kick.
17:59 Caption: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray).
18:05 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
18:07 Event: Ball out of play
18:21 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
18:27 Caption: Felipe Melo (Galatasaray) creates a good chance for himself and goes for goal from mid-range, but he misses the right post by a whisker. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
19:11 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
19:12 Event: Ball out of play
19:18 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Arsenal) picks up a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot goalwards that crashes against the bar. It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray will have a goal kick.
19:36 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
19:42 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
19:55 Caption: Semih Kaya (Galatasaray) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. David Fernandez Borbalan has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle. Arsenal are awarded the free kick.
20:08 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
20:17 Event: Ball out of play
20:17 Caption: Arsenal quickly take the free kick with a short pass.
20:23 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
20:25 Event: Ball out of play
20:32 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
20:46 Event: Ball out of play
21:00 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
21:31 Caption: Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
21:42 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
21:57 Caption: Yaya Sanogo (Arsenal) receives a good pass just outside the box, unleashes a strike from a promising position, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
22:11 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
23:10 Caption: Some neat passing and movement from Arsenal as they ping around some short passes in order to create a new attacking opportunity.
23:20 Caption: Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) is forced to stop his attacking move after the linesman signals for offside.
24:14 Caption: Bruma (Galatasaray) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
24:15 Event: Ball out of play
24:25 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
24:41 Event: Ball out of play
24:49 Caption: A cross by Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor. The ball is out of play. Arsenal will take a throw-in.
24:50 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
25:19 Caption: Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Joel Campbell (Arsenal) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
25:42 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
25:43 Event: Ball out of play
25:52 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) collects a pass and finds himself in a good position to strike from the edge of the box, but his attempt is blocked. Arsenal force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat.
26:15 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.
26:22 Event: Corner by Arsenal
26:25 Event: Shots off target by Arsenal
26:25 Event: Ball out of play
26:36 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
26:40 Caption: Per Mertesacker (Arsenal) finds enough space to climb high and plants a header well wide of the left post. What a poor effort. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray will have a goal kick.
26:59 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
27:00 Event: Ball out of play
27:12 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Arsenal) latches on to a lovely pass inside the box and fires towards the left side of the net, but the effort is smothered by the keeper. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Arsenal will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
27:30 Caption: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Arsenal) is being forced to leave the pitch in order to receive medical treatment and his team will play with a man short for a few minutes.
28:09 Event: Corner by Arsenal
28:12 Event: Shots on target by Arsenal
28:13 Event: Goal by Arsenal
28:25 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
28:35 Caption: Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) quickly gets to a rebound. He is not worried how far out he is and slams the ball towards the goal. To the amazement of all, it goes all the way into the top left corner. He makes it 0:3 with this magnificent strike.
28:50 Caption: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Arsenal) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.
29:03 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
29:16 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
29:18 Event: Ball out of play
29:34 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
29:55 Caption: Emre Colak (Galatasaray) gets a shot away from distance, but wasn't really set to take it and fires high and wide. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
30:14 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
30:21 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
30:34 Caption: It looks like Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) was seeing red according to his tackle. David Fernández Borbalán won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul. A free kick to Arsenal.
30:45 Caption: Arsenal take the free kick with a short pass.
31:17 Caption: Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked.
31:23 Event: Ball out of play
31:24 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
31:53 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
31:54 Event: Ball out of play
32:03 Caption: Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) weaves through the defence with ease and gets into a good position in front of goal. He pulls the trigger in an effort to beat the keeper, but fails as the ball zooms over the bar. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
32:16 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
32:39 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
32:40 Caption: Some patient build-up play from Arsenal as they look to unlock the defence.
32:44 Event: Yellow card by Galatasaray
32:55 Caption: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Felipe Melo (Galatasaray) was quite harsh and David Fernandez Borbalan didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
33:11 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
33:22 Caption: Arsenal try to speed play up by taking a quick free kick.
34:02 Caption: Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) collects an inch-perfect pass and strikes the ball from far out, but his shot is blocked. Rough tackle by Yaya Sanogo (Arsenal). The referee blows his whistle for a foul.
34:14 Event: Foul by Arsenal
34:44 Caption: Mathieu Debuchy (Arsenal) commits a rough challenge and David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle for an infringement. Galatasaray have a free kick from a promising distance.
34:50 Caption: The free kick will be taken by Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray).
34:55 Caption: The free kick from long distance is taken by Burak Yilmaz (Galatasaray), who fires in a direct effort just wide of the left post. What a chance! The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
35:08 Event: Direct free-kick by Galatasaray
35:08 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
35:09 Event: Ball out of play
35:15 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
37:03 Event: Ball out of play
37:03 Caption: Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) found some space to play in a lofted pass, but he looks disappointed as none of his teammates managed to connect with it.
37:17 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) latches on to a cross to head the ball wide of the net. A poor header. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
37:20 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
37:42 Event: Foul by Arsenal
37:59 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
38:00 Event: Ball out of play
38:00 Caption: David Fernandez Borbalan couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) and blew his whistle. Galatasaray have a free kick.
38:04 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
38:11 Caption: What a poor attempt! Bruma (Galatasaray) drives another shot towards goal - this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes into the stands. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
38:48 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
38:52 Caption: Arsenal are showing great team chemistry. They are passing the ball around seamlessly.
39:02 Caption: Poor challenge! Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) is penalised for tripping and David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle. Arsenal win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
39:19 Caption: Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) takes the free kick but it is cleared by the first defender.
39:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
39:45 Event: Ball out of play
39:57 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
40:03 Event: Shots off target by Arsenal
40:04 Event: Ball out of play
40:14 Caption: Sinan Bolat pulls off a great save to deny Joel Campbell (Arsenal), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick low drive to the bottom left corner. Arsenal will take a corner kick.
40:39 Event: Shots off target by Arsenal
40:40 Event: Ball out of play
40:42 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.
40:49 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
40:59 Caption: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Arsenal) clutches his head after wasting a good opportunity. He expertly collected the ball from a rebound and fired from long range, but his effort wasn't accurate at all and the ball went miles over the crossbar. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray will have a goal kick.
41:13 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
41:14 Event: Ball out of play
41:19 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
41:28 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) attempts to surprise the keeper with a shot from distance, but it lacks accuracy and goes high over the crossbar. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
41:59 Caption: David Fernandez Borbalan blows for a foul after Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain (Arsenal) was too aggressive in the battle for the ball. Galatasaray earn a free kick.
42:07 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
42:10 Caption: Galatasaray take a quick free kick with a short pass and play continues.
42:12 Event: Yellow card by Galatasaray
42:36 Caption: David Fernandez Borbalan shows a yellow card to Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) for his blatant foul.
42:44 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
42:46 Event: Shots off target by Arsenal
42:46 Event: Ball out of play
42:59 Caption: Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) will take a free kick. Is he going to strike the ball directly at the goal? Let's find out!
43:10 Event: Clearance by Galatasaray
43:17 Caption: Calum Chambers (Arsenal) leaps high deep inside the box to meet a beautiful cross from the free kick and attempts to score with a header. His effort is not accurate at all and goes well over the bar. The ball goes out of play and Galatasaray will have a goal kick.
43:38 Caption: Decent spell from Galatasaray here and they keep the pressure on until one of the defending players steps in.
44:01 Caption: Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) once again attempts to send a defence-splitting pass, but the opposition's defence is alert and intercepts the ball.
44:35 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) attempts a long crossfield pass, but the defence does well to intercept the ball.
44:37 Event: Ball out of play
44:48 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
44:49 Caption: Arsenal are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error. The linesman signals a throw-in for Galatasaray.
45:30 Caption: Osman Tarik Camdal (Galatasaray) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence clears the ball to safety.
45:59 Caption: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of David Fernandez Borbalan has ended it.
46:59 Caption: So far we have been witnesses to an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will not be a decline in the spectacle in the second half. The away side is controlling this game. Both sides are using the same slow build-up play tactic.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Substitution by Arsenal
00:00 Event: Substitution by Galatasaray
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Galatasaray
00:00 Event: Substitution by Galatasaray
00:00 Event: Substitution by Arsenal
00:00 Caption: There will be a minimum of 1 min. of added time.
00:01 Caption: The game is over for Burak Yilmaz. Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) comes on for the second half.
00:01 Caption: Here is a change after the half-time break. Mathieu Flamini is replaced by Gedion Zelalem (Arsenal).
00:01 Caption: Hamza Hamzaoglu has made a change at the break. Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) has come on in place of Osman Tarik Camdal.
00:01 Caption: Half-time substitution. Aaron Ramsey is replaced by Ainsley Maitland-Niles (Arsenal).
00:01 Caption: The players are back out on the pitch following the half-time break and the second half is about to start.
01:08 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
01:22 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
01:41 Event: Ball out of play
01:48 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
01:49 Event: Foul by Arsenal
01:49 Caption: Dangerous play by Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray). David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle for a foul. Arsenal have a free kick.
01:56 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
02:13 Caption: Arsenal try to maintain the tempo of the game by taking a quick free kick.
02:15 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
02:21 Caption: Handball by Ainsley Maitland-Niles (Arsenal).
03:30 Caption: Galatasaray hold possession of the ball and display neat passing from player to player. They are waiting for the right moment to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.
03:46 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
03:47 Event: Ball out of play
03:52 Caption: What a beautiful long-range strike by Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray). He is quite unlucky as his shot flies just over the bar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
04:01 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
04:14 Event: Offside by Arsenal
04:22 Caption: Yaya Sanogo (Arsenal) fails to time his run beyond the last defender and the linesman makes a good call by signalling for offside after seeing the whole situation unfold.
04:24 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
04:59 Event: Foul by Arsenal
05:09 Caption: Gedion Zelalem (Arsenal) commits a rough foul. David Fernandez Borbalan stops the game and makes a call. A free kick has been awarded to Galatasaray.
05:19 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
05:33 Caption: Galatasaray restart play with a quick free kick.
05:52 Caption: Felipe Melo (Galatasaray) sends a long crossfield pass searching out one of his teammates, but his effort comes to nothing and they lose possession.
06:35 Event: Ball out of play
06:45 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
07:30 Caption: Arsenal exchange some short passes over a small area and control the game. Now they make a mistake and lose the ball and the whole situation changes completely.
07:54 Caption: Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) produces a quality cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball and spanks it away.
07:57 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
07:58 Event: Ball out of play
08:04 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) jinks his way past two defenders and from the edge of the box has an effort which goes just wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
08:11 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
08:22 Event: Ball out of play
08:28 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
09:17 Caption: Galatasaray are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error.
09:59 Event: Ball out of play
10:18 Caption: The ball is behind the sideline. Mathieu Debuchy (Arsenal) takes a throw-in.
10:20 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
10:24 Event: Ball out of play
10:31 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
10:49 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
11:07 Caption: Felipe Melo (Galatasaray) fires the ball from distance, but it's blocked by a defender.
11:09 Event: Foul by Galatasaray
11:14 Event: Yellow card by Galatasaray
11:30 Caption: Semih Kaya (Galatasaray) has tested the patience of referee David Fernandez Borbalan and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
11:35 Event: Indirect free-kick by Arsenal
11:44 Caption: Arsenal produce a short pass from the free kick.
12:40 Caption: The ball is cleared after Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
13:10 Event: Ball out of play
13:24 Caption: Arsenal are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error. It will be a corner kick for Galatasaray.
13:36 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
13:45 Caption: The corner from Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) is cleared away by the defence.
14:01 Event: Ball out of play
14:04 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
14:28 Event: Ball out of play
14:30 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
14:31 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
14:35 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
14:53 Caption: Wojciech Szczesny makes a brilliant save! Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) easily weaves through the defence and unleashes a shot from just outside of the box. His low shot goes towards the middle of the goal but is saved by keeper!
16:03 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
16:13 Caption: Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he unleashed a powerful shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the bottom right corner, but Wojciech Szczesny made a crucial save!
16:45 Caption: Arsenal keep the ball and are displaying some tiki-taka style passing at the moment.
17:05 Event: Ball out of play
17:21 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
18:02 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
18:03 Event: Ball out of play
18:13 Caption: Bruma (Galatasaray) finds himself in a promising position to finish! He unleashes a poor shot which flies into the stands. What a poor effort that was! The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
18:15 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
18:46 Event: Ball out of play
18:56 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
19:06 Caption: Arsenal are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error. The ball is behind the touchline and Galatasaray will take a throw-in.
19:23 Event: Foul by Arsenal
19:30 Event: Yellow card by Arsenal
19:44 Caption: It's like he was asking for a caution. Mathieu Debuchy (Arsenal) receives a yellow card.
19:55 Caption: Lukas Podolski (Arsenal) fails to control his temper and is booked by the referee for dissent.
19:56 Event: Yellow card by Arsenal
20:21 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
20:54 Event: Ball out of play
20:57 Caption: Umut Bulut (Galatasaray) is first to the rebound and sends a header goalwards but it's blocked. Wow, what an escape there for the opposition.
21:01 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
21:16 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
21:18 Event: Ball out of play
21:27 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
21:37 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. Good work from Galatasaray as they win a corner.
21:52 Caption: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Bruma (Galatasaray). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.
22:20 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
22:21 Event: Ball out of play
22:33 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
22:55 Caption: Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) goes for goal, but slices it wide of the target.
23:08 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) fires the ball on goal, but his attempt goes well wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
23:27 Caption: Galatasaray string together a series of short passes.
24:05 Caption: Bruma (Galatasaray) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
25:36 Event: Ball out of play
25:50 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
26:20 Caption: We can have a look at the statistics now, particularly the total attempts – 32:13.
26:42 Event: Ball out of play
26:42 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players.
27:02 Caption: The ball is cleared after Joel Campbell (Arsenal) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Arsenal.
27:12 Event: Corner by Arsenal
27:17 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
27:28 Event: Ball out of play
27:39 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
27:49 Caption: Arsenal exchange some short passes over a small area and control the game. Now they make a mistake and lose the ball and the whole situation changes completely. The ball has crossed the sideline. Galatasaray are taking a throw-in.
28:33 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
28:34 Event: Ball out of play
28:53 Caption: An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the left post. The ball goes out of play and Arsenal will have a goal kick.
28:58 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
30:21 Caption: Emre Colak (Galatasaray) smashes the ball upfield and Bruma controls it with a great first touch.
30:42 Event: Ball out of play
30:55 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Wojciech Szczesny, who smothers the ball.
31:10 Event: Substitution by Arsenal
31:26 Event: Substitution by Galatasaray
31:29 Caption: It is time for a substitution. Stefan O'Connor (Arsenal) is on for Mathieu Debuchy.
31:38 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
31:41 Caption: Substitution. Bruma makes way for Olcan Adin (Galatasaray).
31:51 Event: Foul by Arsenal
32:03 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
32:13 Event: Ball out of play
32:13 Caption: Joel Campbell (Arsenal) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence clears the ball away to eliminate the danger.
32:17 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
32:31 Caption: David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle and it's Yaya Sanogo (Arsenal) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.
33:10 Event: Ball out of play
33:14 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
33:15 Caption: A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray), is intercepted by the opposition's defence.
33:26 Event: Shots on target by Galatasaray
33:42 Event: Shots off target by Galatasaray
33:43 Event: Ball out of play
33:52 Caption: Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) misses a good chance to score. An inch-perfect cross into the box finds Wesley Sneijder (Galatasaray) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
34:00 Event: Clearance by Arsenal
34:19 Caption: Hamit Altintop (Galatasaray) takes a shot after receiving a good pass, but his effort from the edge of the box goes just over the crossbar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Arsenal.
35:33 Caption: Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
35:51 Event: Foul by Arsenal
36:04 Event: Indirect free-kick by Galatasaray
36:16 Caption: David Fernandez Borbalan has a clear sight and sees a foul from Yaya Sanogo (Arsenal). Galatasaray are awarded a free kick. Let's see what they create from this.
36:30 Caption: The free kick is taken short by Galatasaray.
36:51 Caption: Alex Nicolao Telles (Galatasaray) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked.
37:03 Event: Ball out of play
37:12 Caption: A perfect long pass by Emre Colak (Galatasaray) finds Alex Nicolao Telles. He latches on to the pass and continues his attacking run.
37:15 Event: Throw-in by Arsenal
37:42 Caption: Galatasaray are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw-in for Arsenal.
38:53 Event: Ball out of play
38:55 Event: Throw-in by Galatasaray
39:11 Caption: Arsenal players are exchanging short passes with one another, waiting for the right moment to beat the opposition's defence.
39:12 Event: Ball out of play
39:26 Event: Corner by Galatasaray
39:36 Caption: Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Galatasaray.
39:47 Caption: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Yasin Oztekin (Galatasaray) takes it short.

    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.

summary:
On a crisp evening in Istanbul, the air was filled with anticipation as Galatasaray hosted Arsenal at the Turk Telekom Arena. The match, which had been eagerly awaited by fans and pundits alike, kicked off with Arsenal taking the initial possession at the referee’s whistle. However, their early momentum was briefly halted only 40 seconds in by a disruptive foul from Galatasaray, leading to an indirect free kick.

Arsenal, unperturbed, quickly transformed the set piece into an offensive move. As the clock barely ticked past the first minute of play, they had already seen shots on target. Without missing a beat, one of these attempts found the back of the net, putting Arsenal in the lead, 1-0, a mere minute into the game.

Galatasaray, now trailing, tried to recalibrate their strategy as they kicked off. However, the response from their opponents was fierce. Arsenal’s offense persisted, swiftly reclaiming possession and advancing towards goal. Their relentless energy bore fruit in the tenth minute as Aaron Ramsey received a sharp pass inside the box from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. Showing remarkable composure, Ramsey slotted the ball into the bottom right corner, extending Arsenal's lead to 2-0.

Galatasaray's frustration began to surface across the pitch. Fouls became more frequent, and the game grew increasingly physical. Flamini of Arsenal earned a yellow card at the 14th minute for a rough tackle, setting the tone for the midfield duels that followed. Using an indirect free kick, Galatasaray tried to respond, but an attempt by Umut Bulut from long range soared high above the stands, posing no threat to Arsenal's defense.

Arsenal's control continued unabated, with masterful possession and fluid passes that saw them dominate the midfield. An offside call against Debuchy momentarily interrupted their rhythm, but it didn't take long for the Gunners to reassert control. In the 28th minute, following a corner, another magnificent play materialized. Aaron Ramsey seized a rebound from outside the box and, undeterred by distance, launched a powerful shot that rocketed into the top left corner. Arsenal led 3-0, much to the dismay of the home fans.

Galatasaray, visibly struggling to contain Arsenal's onslaught, resorted to aggressive tactics. Felipe Melo received a yellow card for a harsh tackle, his frustration palpable as Galatasaray failed to mount a substantial response. Sneijder and Bulut’s attempts from distance were either blocked by determined Arsenal defenders or veered off target. Each unsuccessful attempt compounded the pressure on the Turkish side.

By the 41st minute, Galatasaray found themselves in dire straits, yet managed to carve out a glimmer of hope when Wesley Sneijder blasted a free kick just over the bar, missing by inches. As the referee’s whistle signaled the end of the first half, Arsenal held a commanding 3-0 lead, with Galatasaray needing a drastic shift in strategy.

The second half saw a flurry of substitutions aimed at revitalizing Galatasaray's flagging spirits. Burak Yilmaz was replaced by Yasin Oztekin while Hamit Altintop came on for Osman Tarik Camdal. Arsenal made their own changes with Gedion Zelalem stepping in for Mathieu Flamini and Ainsley Maitland-Niles for Aaron Ramsey. These tactical switches were swiftly put to the test.

The opening moments of the second half mirrored the first in tempo and physicality. Galatasaray, eager to recover, conceded an early foul, allowing Arsenal to restart play. The game saw spirited attempts from both sides, with Yasin Oztekin missing narrowly over the bar following a promising buildup. Maitland-Niles of Arsenal committed a handball, granting Galatasaray another opportunity which, frustratingly for the home team, went unconverted.

Despite Galatasaray's efforts to dominate possession through slick passes and strategic buildups, Arsenal's defense held firm. Every now and then, tension boiled over into fouls and yellow cards, with Semih Kaya receiving a booking for a late challenge. Arsenal responded with fierce attacks, testing Galatasaray’s defense. Debuchy’s excellent defensive clearance and Szczesny’s remarkable saves underscored the resilience of the Arsenal backline.

The 65th minute turned out to be a critical juncture for Arsenal. Their defense was tested repeatedly, with Galatasaray launching several shots on target, only to be thwarted time and again by Arsenal's goalkeeping. Yet, the offensive force of Galatasaray remained undeterred. Finally, in the 87th minute, Wesley Sneijder's persistence reaped rewards. He curled a spectacular direct free kick over the defensive wall and into the top left corner, giving Galatasaray a glimmer of consolation with a score of 3-1.

As the match neared its conclusion, Lukas Podolski shattered any hopes Galatasaray had of a miraculous comeback. Eager to reassert their dominance, Arsenal’s Podolski utilized a brilliant assist from Yaya Sanogo to deliver a clinical finish into the bottom right corner, sealing the game at 4-1.

The final whistle arrived at the 93rd minute, heralding a well-deserved victory for Arsenal. The statistics painted a clear picture: Arsenal had been efficient with their chances, converting key opportunities despite a commendable number of attempts from Galatasaray's side that either missed the mark or were superbly saved by Wojciech Szczesny. Throughout the match, the Gunners demonstrated superior tactical coherence, expert possession play, and decisive finishing, without sacrificing defensive solidity.

In conclusion, the clash between Galatasaray and Arsenal was a breathtaking display of skill, strategy, and tenacity. Arsenal’s early dominance and steadfast defense left little room for Galatasaray to maneuver, allowing them to control the pace and outcome of the game. The visitors’ clinical finishing from Ramsey and Podolski, combined with resilient defending, ensured that they left Istanbul with a convincing 4-1 victory. Meanwhile, Galatasaray, despite their relentless efforts, fell short on the day, undone by their inability to convert possession into goals against a well-organized Arsenal side. The Arsenal supporters left jubilant, and while the home fans might have been disappointed, they were undeniably treated to an evening of high-quality football.
